title: Tata Power Renewable Energy, NHPC Renewable join hands for installation of rooftop solar projects
description: Tata Power Renewable Energy Ltd (TPREL) has partnered with NHPC Renewable Energy Ltd to install rooftop solar projects on government buildings. The collaboration aims for 100% solarisation by 2025, reducing the carbon footprint and promoting a green energy future. An MOU was signed on July 17, 2024, to formalise this initiative.
